EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
On the 12th November as part of the We are Youth campaign we are holding an event in Birmingham for a limited number of lucky graduates. Are you up for a real challenge and getting your hands a bit dirty? A film maker will be at this event and other events across the country to create a piece that celebrates your achievements!
The day will involve three exciting community-based challenges and you will get a chance to take part in all of them:
Join a talented graffiti artist to create a mural in Digbeth
Work with a local charity, The Stroke Association, to support their work.
Completing the performance challenge with either a drama practitioner or circus skills practitioner.
There will be a free dinner at the end of the day, but you will need to bring a packed lunch.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=39133822b338702&q1={!Contact.Id}
Places are limited so sign up now before it's too late! Only those who have RSVP'd will be allowed in.
Where: Upstairs in the Ulster Suite Irish Centre Birmingham 14-20 High Street Deritend (Digbeth) Birmingham B12 0LN
When: 12/11/2011
10:30 - 18:00
